string.text:
Just a sheet of paper. Nothing special.

 %c[0,140,140,140] PROPERTIES:

 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] application: %c[0,170,170,170] maintenance (2%)

It is a bundle of very thin soft steel filaments. Used as an abrasive in finishing and repair work,for polishing wood or metal objects,cleaning dishes and so on.

 %c[0,140,140,140] PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological element
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] application: %c[0,170,170,170] maintenance (6%)

Grease lubrication. Typically,it consists of soap emulsified with mineral or vegetable oil. Greases are applied to gears that cannot be oiled. They also act as seals to prevent water penetration and contamination.

 %c[0,140,140,140] PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological element
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high quality
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] application: %c[0,170,170,170] maintenance (6%)

Used for darning clothes and cleaning weapons.

 %c[0,140,140,140] PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Daily
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] application: %c[0,170,170,170] maintenance (3%)

Can be used to repair clothing and light armor in the field. Appreciate for its relatively low price and high versatility.

 %c[0,140,140,140] PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military property
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] application: %c[0,170,170,170] maintenance (4%)

Thick,kevlar-reinforced fabric. Can be used for repairing medium to heavy body armor. Large enough to cover several damaged areas.

 %c[0,140,140,140] PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military property
 %c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high quality
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] application: %c[0,170,170,170] maintenance (6%)

%c[0,140,140,140] COMPATIBILITY:

 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] all costumes and light helmets

 %c[0,170,170,170] the cheapest of synthetic adhesives available in the Zone. An epoxy resin solution can be used to collect a few scraps of tissue or seal a small hole in the helmet.

%c[0,140,140,140] COMPATIBILITY:

 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] all costumes and helmets

 %c[0,170,170,170] Modified glue produced by the chemical industry of Ukraine. Clay binds both textile fabrics and lightweight protective materials,such as Kevlar,but is free when it comes to metals.

%c[0,140,140,140] COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] all costumes and helmets

 %c[0,170,170,170] Extremely powerful,one-glue adhesive that can be used in any situation,regardless of purpose and materials. the glue uses strong methacrylate,in addition,the adhesive has received a significant impulse of versatility due to its hydrated form: it can be diluted water and used in any concentration,depending on the desired result. Almost no such damage,which glue,in combination with the relevant materials,cannot be restored.

Gold coin of Emperor Nicholas II.
Trade in the Zone is carried out mainly through electronic money. But many stalkers hold several coins in their pocket just in case.

'Diamond powder'-such a common name is given to a crystal-like substance, found sometimes in the belly of all kinds of psi-beings. It is not known what kind of metabolic processes lead to its appearance. Scientists are willing to pay large sums of money to get it in their hands. Practical use is limited, but some stalkers, as is known, sprinkle them with the most treasured hunting knives, as this makes sharpening much easier. This also makes the blades more shiny and refined.
the display is dead, a constant hiss from the speaker.
A radio receiver found in the Zone.
A small receiver with a broken antenna.

Thanks to everyone who downloaded and appreciated my build, especially to those who gave feedback on the defects found in the assembly!/Huge gratitude to the authors, whose mods were used in the assembly!/Stason174rus
Combines several devices for first aid. Such as a primary dressing, an applicator, a secondary dressing and an impeccable device for securing the dressing in place.
Amphetamine is a stimulant and improves endurance and reaction time. Side effects include dizziness, blurred vision, or anxiety.

Diazepam, first introduced to the market as valium is a drug of the benzodiazepine family, which, as a rule, produces a calming effect. It is widely used to treat a range of symptoms, including anxiety, muscle spasms, convulsions, sleep problems, and restless syndrome feet. Common side effects include drowsiness and coordination problems.
A diet in light packaging developed by the United States armed forces for use in combat and field conditions.

Classic baked beans in a charming tomato sauce; with a high fiber content, virtually no fat. They also do not contain artificial colors, flavors and preservatives, which makes them an ideal snack or complement to any dish.
Ragout of beans. Production of the USA.
Canned, diced tomatoes are imported into the zone on a regular basis. the shelf life at the bottom of the pot assumes that they are still fresh.
It is known for its high nutritional value (mainly due to its high fat content) and relatively good taste.
Canned sweet corn. Some people use it as a component of soup.
Very rare in the Zone and very appreciated, although the taste is nothing special.
This mixture provides the body with the necessary proteins and sugar. Useful in long hikes.
A bag of raisins. Rich in nutrients.
Assorted: peanuts, hazelnuts, cashews and almonds. Nutritional value is high enough. Imported from South Africa.
Rough forcemeat with natural juice, Russian style of canned meat 'Tushyonka'.
Bulls are so tender that they literally melt in the mouth. This food is valued by stalkers throughout the Zone.
Natural energy from an extract of African cola nuts without coloring agents and preservatives.
